constructor(uint8 decimals_, string name_, string symbol_)
event Approval(address indexed owner, address indexed spender, uint256 value)
event OwnershipTransferred(address indexed previousOwner, address indexed newOwner)
event Transfer(address indexed from, address indexed to, uint256 value)
event UpdateDetails(string indexed name, string indexed symbol)
function approve(address spender, uint256 amount) returns (bool)
function permit(address _owner, address _spender, uint256 _value, uint256 _deadline, uint8 _v, bytes32 _r, bytes32 _s)
function transfer(address to, uint256 amount) returns (bool)
